common_name: Ruslyn In The Pink Japanese Maple

hardiness_location.full_iframe: <iframe frameborder=0 scrolling=yes seamless=seamless width=1000 height=550 style='margin:auto;' src='https://perenual.com/api/hardiness-map?species_id=110&size=og&key=sk-kMpx68b02586bb61112084'></iframe>

description: The Ruslyn In The Pink Japanese Maple is an absolutely stunning tree with its vibrant hues of deep greens and vibrant pinks. It's an ideal choice for landscape planters and gardeners who are looking for a beautiful tree that will add a colorful accent to any outdoor space. Its leaves change color throughout the season, from dark greens during the summer months to yellows and pinks as the season progresses. In the fall and winter, the tree's leaves become dark red, giving any landscape an interesting contrast of colors. This variety of Japanese Maple tree is easy to care for, and its unique and vibrant foliage is a perfect delight for any garden.
